Title: Multithreading in Blazor WASM using Web Workers - Kristoffer Strubeâ€™s Blog
Description: In this article, we will go through how to use two of the most prominent Blazor Web Workers OSS libraries; we will show a separate Web Workers implementation that I have created myself which uses the experimental-wasm .NET workload and, in the end, do a little comparison of how each of them performs for a variety of workloads.
